plot outline: This film is the remake of the hit Kannada film - Charminar. This is the journey of love of a young boy. The film shows how love can inspire and aspire to be the best and give the best to the loved ones. A very youthful and musical entertainer to fill your hearts with joy. A timeless tale of true love. Come, experience the roller-coaster ride of LOVE. (Lots Of Varying Emotions)
title: Krishnamma Kalipindi Iddarini
plot: This film is the remake of the hit Kannada film - Charminar. This is the journey of love of a young boy. The film shows how love can inspire and aspire to be the best and give the best to the loved ones. A very youthful and musical entertainer to fill your hearts with joy. A timeless tale of true love.
